definitions.definition: To descend a steep or vertical drop using a rope with a mechanical friction device or (classic abseil) by wrapping the rope around the body; to rappel .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 20th century.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To descend a steep or vertical drop using a rope with a mechanical friction device or (classic abseil) by wrapping the rope around the body; to rappel . [First attested in the mid 20th century.]
